{{help
|topic=+heat
|detail=Heat is when the Bluecoats are after you. It complicates your Scores and makes your entanglements more dangerous. Heat affects your whole crew - any member can gain it in a Score, or clear it with downtime.
|example=
* '''+heat''' - see your crew's heat and Wanted Level.
* '''+heat/gain <#>=<reason>''' - bring some heat down on your crew. 
* '''+dt/heat''' - spend a point of downtime to clear a point of your crew's heat.
